body.p: Kentucky farmer. Lived in Green County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Eliza A. Scott DeSpain. Father of Mary S. DeSpain, Catherine A. DeSpain, William T. DeSpain, and George F. DeSpain. Served as a sergeant and 2nd lieutenant in the 13th Kentucky Infantry (Co. A.) from April 1862 to November 1862. Deserted the army on November 1, 1862.
